title: Career Counseling 101
description: An introductory course designed to help individuals explore various career paths and set achievable goals.

title: Building a Winning Resume
description: Learn how to craft a resume that stands out to employers and showcases your unique skills.

title: Academic Pathways for Career Success
description: Understand how to align academic choices with long-term career goals.

title: Effective Networking Strategies
description: Discover how to build and maintain professional relationships that can advance your career.

title: Soft Skills for Career Development
description: Master essential soft skills such as communication, teamwork, and problem-solving for workplace success.

title: Introduction to Psychometric Assessments
description: Learn how psychometric tests can help identify strengths and career preferences.
